entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
